title: Kunshan City Centre Stay with Diverse Dining Options
description: Towering above a trendsetting retail complex, Crowne Plaza Kunshan, an IHG Hotel, is a gleaming oasis, where urban streetscapes meet the leafy Tinglin Park, home to tearooms, temples and the Kunqu Opera Museum. Sate your hunger with a diverse range of dishes at Grand Cafe or authentic Cantonese cuisine at Cai Feng Lou. As the sun sets, kick back with casual beers and snacks over a game of darts at the laid-back Burger Bar.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Kunshan, an IHG Hotel
